__e: Frankie Christopher took you and your sister out for a ride the evening before the murder.
Lady Handel presents her compliments... and would like to have Mr. Christopher and his party have supper with her.
My name is Christopher and I have more than 10 years of experience in Information Technology.
And Christopher has followed in our footsteps.
Without a doubt, the woman who had delivered the data from Mr. Christopher... was the woman who had left the cigarette.
And Christopher style is not to wait.
